application-versions.name: Microsoft Sharepoint Server 2010
application-versions.description:
This example contains a single node Sharepoint server with a sample application.
Microsoft SharePoint 2010 makes it easier for people to work together. Using SharePoint 2010, your people can set up Web sites to share information with others, manage documents from start to finish, and publish reports to help everyone make better decisions.

application.name: Microsoft Sharepoint Server 2010
application.description: Microsoft SharePoint 2010 makes it easier for people to work together. Using SharePoint 2010, your people can set up Web sites to share information with others, manage documents from start to finish, and publish reports to help everyone make better decisions.
